participant_1.background:
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonald.
I am not married, but I do enjoy online shopping and collecting memories from my vacations.
I enjoy quiet activities in my free time, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature.
i am colour blind.

participant_2.background:
I can stay up late to watch my favorite TV shows.
I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.
i speak french and english fluently.
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
I am proud of my ability to get a degree in two years despite my reputation as a slacker.

content.text: Not much, just got back from a hike in the park. I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
That's cool! I love nature documentaries too. I'm more of a couch potato, but I love learning about other cultures.
That's awesome! I wish I could travel more. I've only ever been to Mexico and Canada.
I've been to a bunch of places! I'm fluent in French and English, so I like to travel to places where I can use both languages.
That's amazing! I only know English. I wish I knew another language.
It's never too late to learn! I started learning French in high school.
Yeah, I might try to learn Spanish. I've always wanted to go to Spain.
Spain is beautiful! I've been there a few times. I love the food.
I've heard the food is amazing! I love Mexican food, so I can only imagine how good Spanish food is.
It's so good! I could eat it every day.
Haha, me too! Well, I should probably go. It was great talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
